tool_description: Propagates satellite orbital states forward or backward in time using numerical integration with gravitational and perturbation forces.

initial_position_km.description: Initial position vector [x, y, z] in Earth-centered inertial coordinates (km)

initial_velocity_kmps.description: Initial velocity vector [vx, vy, vz] in km/s

start_time.description: Initial epoch time in UTC ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Final propagation time in UTC ISO 8601 format

time_step_seconds.description: Output time step interval in seconds

include_j2_perturbation.description: Include Earth oblateness J2 perturbation effects

error_messages: Invalid initial conditions: Position magnitude must be > 6371 km (Earth radius) and velocity must be reasonable for orbital motion.
Time sequence error: start_time must be before end_time.
Invalid time step: time_step_seconds must be positive and < 86400 (1 day).
Orbital decay detected: Satellite has impacted Earth surface during propagation.
usage: Provide initial position and velocity vectors in ECI coordinates, specify time range and optional perturbation settings. Returns time series of orbital states.

timestamps.description: Array of time stamps in UTC ISO 8601 format

positions_km.description: Array of position vectors [x,y,z] in km at each timestamp

velocities_kmps.description: Array of velocity vectors [vx,vy,vz] in km/s at each timestamp

orbital_energy.description: Specific orbital energy at each timestamp (km²/s²)
